title: Paris Hilton dons a plunging animal print jumpsuit as she leaves lingerie shop in LA
text:
She is known for commanding attention with her sexy style choices everywhere she goes.

And Paris Hilton didn't disappoint as she was seen leaving the Trashy Lingerie store in Los Angeles on Thursday night.

The heiress, 38, sizzled in a perilously plunging animal print jumpsuit which she teamed with a cropped sequinned jacket.

Star: Paris Hilton, 38, showed off her signature style as she was seen leaving the Trashy Lingerie store in Los Angeles on Thursday night

Carrying out a bag full of purchased for her new Halloween costume, Paris looked in great spirits as she strutted along in a black heeled boots.

The DJ added to her look with thick bondage-style choker and styled a thick black belt to her look to cinch in her waist.

Despite it being dark, Paris added to her signature look with a pair of Yves Saint Laurent heart-eye shades, while piling her locks into a high ponytail.

Glamorous: The heiress sizzled in a perilously plunging animal print jumpsuit which she teamed with a cropped sequinned jacket

The Simple Life star looked in her element as she carried her new belongings while holding onto a glittering black handbag in her other hand.

It's been a tough time as of late for Paris who has been grieving the loss of her grandfather, who passed away at the age of 91 last month.

She recently stopped by People Now to discuss the passing of Barron, expressing: 'It's been really hard, we were so close.'

Trendy: The DJ added to her look with thick bondage-style choker and styled a thick black belt to her look to cinch in her waist.

'My entire life I've looked up to him and admired him and he's been my mentor, and he's such a legend,' she continued.

'I'm heartbroken that he's gone, but I have to think about it in a way that he lived such a full life,' Paris shared.

'He created this incredible legacy, and I'm going to continue with his legacy. And now he's in heaven with my grandmother,' she concluded.
description: Paris Hilton, 38, showed off her signature style as she was seen leaving the Trashy Lingerie store in Los Angeles on Thursday night.
